예문: What direction is the railway station?
The points of the compass are north, south, east, and west.
예문 뜻: 나침반의 방위 표시들은 북쪽, 남쪽, 동쪽, 그리고 서쪽이야.

예문: The wind is coming from the north.
If that way is east, then this way is west.
예문 뜻: 만약 저쪽이 동쪽이면, 그러면 이쪽이 서쪽이야.

예문: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
I’m leaving but will return at 6 p.m.
I received an e-mail from her yesterday.
I asked her a question, but she didn’t respond.
예문 뜻: 나는 그녀에게 질문을 했지만, 그녀는 대답하지 않았어.
